analyzed: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /

analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /🔽bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin @2a #//
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin @2a #//
translated: Thus have I heard at one time:

original: gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste /
translated: The Blessed One was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta's Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada's park, with a great saṅgha of twelve thousand monks, namely:

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /
translated: The Venerable Ājñātakauṇḍinya, the Venerable Aśvajit, the Venerable Bāṣpa, the Venerable Mahānāman, the Venerable Bhadrika, the Venerable Yaśodhara,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /🔽tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / @2b tshe dang ldan pa moo dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a'i bu chen po dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / @2b tshe dang ldan pa moo dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a'i bu chen po dang /
translated: the Venerable Vimalakīrti, the Venerable Subāhu, the Venerable Pūrṇa, the Venerable Godhika, the Venerable Uruvilvā-Kāśyapa, the Venerable Nadī-Kāśyapa,🔽the Venerable Gayā-Kāśyapa, the Venerable Śāriputra, the Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, the Venerable Mahākāśyapa, the Venerable Mahākātyāyana,

original: tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /
translated: the Venerable Mahākapphiṇa, the Venerable Mahākauṣṭhila, the Venerable Mahācunda, the Venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra, the Venerable Aniruddha, the Venerable Nandī,🔽and others.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang /
translated: the Venerable Uluka, the Venerable Subhuti, the Venerable Revata, the Venerable Sisupacala, the Venerable Amoghadarśin, the Venerable Mahāpratibhāna,

original: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: the Venerable Bakula, the Venerable Nanda, the Venerable Rāhula, the Venerable Svāgata, the Venerable Ānanda, and so forth, together with twelve thousand monks.

original: @3a #// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: @3a #// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: There were also thirty-two thousand bodhisattvas, all of whom were only one birth away from buddhahood,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa /
translated: who had been born from the perfection of all bodhisattva practices,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba; byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba; byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa /
translated: he had attained all the dhāraṇīs of the bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa /
translated: he had attained all the eloquence of the bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: he had perfectly accomplished all the prayers of the bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa /
translated: he had realized all the discernments of the bodhisattvas;🔽he had attained mastery over all the samādhis of the bodhisattvas;🔽he had attained all the powers of the bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa; byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa; byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa /
translated: he had entered all the acceptances of the bodhisattvas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag @3b ste; 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i tog dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag @3b ste; 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i tog dang /
translated: They were all bodhisattvas who had perfected all the bodhisattva levels. They were the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dhāraṇīśvara­rāja, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Siṃhaketu,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Siddhārtha­mati, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Praśānta­cāritra­mati, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Pratyalaṃbhayatna,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Nityodyukta, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mahākaruṇācintin, and so on—thirty-two thousand bodhisattvas.

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang /
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang /
translated: At that time, the Bhagavān was in the great city of Śrāvastī together with four assemblies, kings, princes, the king’s great ministers, vassal kings, the king’s servants, the kṣatriyas,

original: bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dpyod pa pa dang /
analyzed: bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dpyod pa pa dang /
translated: brāhmans, merchants, householders, ministers, people of the retinue, city-dwellers, country-dwellers, tīrthikas, śramaṇas, brāhmans, logicians,

original: kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim @4a *//
analyzed: kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim @4a *//
translated: and various wandering mendicants.

original: gror byas / bla mar byas /
analyzed: gror byas / bla mar byas /
translated: He was honored, revered,

original: bsti stang du byas; mchod pa byas so //
analyzed: bsti stang du byas; mchod pa byas so //
translated: and worshipped.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni; bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni; bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing /
translated: The Blessed One had obtained good and abundant food and drink, clothes, bedding, and medicines, and he had obtained suitable provisions.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang padma la chus mi gos pa ltar thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang padma la chus mi gos pa ltar thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One, having obtained the highest gain and fame, remained unattached and unfettered, like a lotus flower unaffected by water.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / sgra dang snyan pa ni 'di skad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / sgra dang snyan pa ni 'di skad du /
translated: The Blessed One’s fame, renown, and praise were proclaimed in this way:

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: “The Blessed One is the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, endowed with knowledge and conduct, the Sugata,

original: 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
translated: the Knower of the world,

original: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
analyzed: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
translated: the Incomparable Trainer of men to be tamed, the Teacher of gods and humans, the Buddha, the Blessed One.

original: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
translated: He is the Teacher of gods and humans.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to //
translated: He is the Blessed Buddha, renowned in the world.

original: de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste /
translated: He possesses the five eyes.🔽He has actualized and accomplished this world and the next world,

original: 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa /
translated: with their gods,

original: bdud dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bdud dang bcas pa /
translated: with their Māras,

original: tshangs pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with their Brahmās,🔽with their śramaṇas and brahmins, and with gods and humans.

original: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu lha dang mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad @4b nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to //🔽de thog mar dge ba /🔽bar du dge ba /
analyzed: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu lha dang mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad @4b nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to // de thog mar dge ba / bar du dge ba /
translated: He teaches the Dharma that is good in the beginning,🔽good in the middle,

original: tha mar dge ba /🔽don bzang po /
analyzed: tha mar dge ba / don bzang po /
translated: and good in the end.

original: tshig 'bru bzang po /🔽ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: tshig 'bru bzang po / ma 'dres pa /
translated: It has excellent meaning and excellent words.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: It is unadulterated, complete,

original: yongs su dag pa /🔽yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa / yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te /
translated: pure, and clear.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma that is pure in conduct.

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to // bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba
translated: At that time, the Blessed One entered into the meditative absorption called the Array of the Ornaments of the Buddhas during the middle part of the night.

original: la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste /
analyzed: la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste /
translated: As soon as the Blessed One entered that meditative absorption called the Array of the Ornaments of the Buddhas, in that very instant, from the crown protrusion on the crown of the Blessed One's head, a light ray called the Illumination of Unimpeded Wisdom Remembering Past Buddhas emerged.

original: des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul to //
analyzed: des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul to //
translated: That light illuminated all the realms of the gods in the Pure Abodes and inspired countless gods, such as Maheśvara, the gods.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de las skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de las skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo //
translated: And from that mass of light rays of the Tathāgata, these verses of exhortation emerged:

original: ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa //
analyzed: ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa //
translated: “You who have wisdom, light, and destroy darkness,

original: 'od bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa //
analyzed: 'od bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa //
translated: You who have good light, excellent splendor, and are stainless,

original: sku lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi ba po //
analyzed: sku lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi ba po //
translated: You who have a peaceful body, a virtuous mind, and peace,

original: sh'akya'i sengge thub dang phrad par gyis //
analyzed: sh'akya'i sengge thub dang phrad par gyis //
translated: You should meet the Sage, the Lion of the Śākyas.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste //
translated: You who are an ocean of wisdom, have great power, and are pure,

original: chos kyi mnga' bdag @5a *//
analyzed: chos kyi mnga' bdag @5a *//
translated: You who are the lord of the Dharma,

original: kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang //
analyzed: kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang //
translated: You who are the omniscient lord of sages,

original: mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa //
analyzed: mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa //
translated: You who are worshipped by humans and gods and have become the god of gods,

original: chos la rang byung mnga' dbang mdzad la rton //
analyzed: chos la rang byung mnga' dbang mdzad la rton //
translated: You should rely on the one who has mastery over the self-arisen Dharma.

original: gang zhig gdul ka'i sems la mnga' mdzad de //
analyzed: gang zhig gdul ka'i sems la mnga' mdzad de //
translated: You who have mastery over the mind that needs to be tamed,

original: gang zhig bdud kyi rnyi las grol ba'i thugs //
analyzed: gang zhig bdud kyi rnyi las grol ba'i thugs //
translated: You whose mind is liberated from the snares of Māra,

original: de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyi //
analyzed: de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyi //
translated: Here, seeing and hearing you is not meaningless,

original: rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du dengs //
analyzed: rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du dengs //
translated: So go to the one who has attained the end of liberation and peace.

original: mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste //
analyzed: mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste //
translated: You who have become the light of the incomparable Dharma,

original: mun sel tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa //
analyzed: mun sel tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa //
translated: And who is the best at showing the way to dispel the darkness.

original: sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa //
translated: “The Buddha’s conduct is peaceful and his wisdom is immeasurable.

original: de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis dengs //
analyzed: de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis dengs //
translated: Go to him with the highest faith.

original: de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong //
analyzed: de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong //
translated: He is the king of physicians who gives the nectar of immortality.

original: de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms //
analyzed: de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms //
translated: He is the hero of speech who conquers the hordes of evil.

original: de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas //
translated: He is the friend of Dharma who is skilled in the ultimate truth.

original: de ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston pa'o //🔽gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu rab

original: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
translated: The Blessed One, out of compassion for the bodhisattva great beings, the great hearers, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas, assented by his silence.

original: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
translated: This is what was said:

original: dge slong dag kye nga ni mdang sum 'dir //
analyzed: dge slong dag kye nga ni mdang sum 'dir //
translated: “Monks, last night

original: gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing //
analyzed: gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing //
translated: I was dwelling in a good place, happily,

original: nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la //
analyzed: nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la //
translated: Dwelling in the absence of afflictions,

original: rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du //🔽rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la //
analyzed: rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du // rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la //
translated: In a state of one-pointed concentration.

original: dri med dpal 'bar lha yi bu lhags nas //
analyzed: dri med dpal 'bar lha yi bu lhags nas //
translated: A son of the gods, of great miracles, with a beautiful complexion,🔽Blazing with stainless splendor,

original: dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te //
analyzed: dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te //
translated: Illuminated this Jeta Grove with glory,

original: dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags //
analyzed: dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags //
translated: And joyfully approached me.

original: dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsandan dang // dga' bo rab tu sems @8b zhi mchod byas dang // shin tu dga' bo zhi ba lha yi bu //
analyzed: dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsandan dang // dga' bo rab tu sems @8b zhi mchod byas dang // shin tu dga' bo zhi ba lha yi bu //
translated: and also the divine sons Supriya, Śānti,

original: bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams //🔽nga yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te //🔽nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur; ;sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar gus bcas par //
analyzed: bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams // nga yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te // nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur; ;sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar gus bcas par //
translated: and many other devas by the millions,🔽they all bowed down to my feet and circumambulated me.🔽They sat down in front of me

original: de dag 'dir ni nga la gsol ba btab //
analyzed: de dag 'dir ni nga la gsol ba btab //
translated: and with palms together they supplicated me:

original: 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du //
translated: ‘For the sake of benefiting the entire world,🔽please teach the Mahāyāna

original: rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang gsungs pa //🔽shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang gsungs pa // shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di //
translated: that was taught in the past by all the jinas.

original: thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang //
analyzed: thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang //
translated: O Sage, you have eliminated desire,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun bzung bzhed pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun bzung bzhed pas //
translated: and today you wish to gather the assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: phas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad la //
analyzed: phas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad la //
translated: You are the one who tames opponents and māras,

original: theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing //
analyzed: theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing //
translated: and you teach this supreme Mahāyāna.

original: thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol //
analyzed: thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol //
translated: O Sage, please teach it well.’

original: lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de snang phyir //
analyzed: lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de snang phyir //
translated: The assembly of gods, seeing this, made a request.

original: mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad pas na //
analyzed: mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad pas na //
translated: Since he did not speak, he gave his consent.

original: thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas //
analyzed: thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas //
translated: All were satisfied, and they were delighted and happy.

original: dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor //
analyzed: dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor //
translated: They obtained joy and scattered flower petals.

original: de phyir dge slong shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo; ;'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir //
analyzed: de phyir dge slong shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo; ;'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir //
translated: Therefore, bhikṣus, for the benefit of all worlds,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa //
translated: The Tathāgata previously taught

original: gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig /🔽gleng gzhi'i le'u ste /
analyzed: gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig / gleng gzhi'i le'u ste /
translated: The great nidāna. All of you, listen here!🔽This is the first chapter, on the nidāna.

original: dang po'o;;/ /dge slong dag /
analyzed: dang po'o;;/ /dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na /
translated: what is that Dharma discourse called the Great Extensive Sūtra of the Great Vaipulya?

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' @9a *//
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' @9a *//
translated: here the bodhisattva,

original: dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa /
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa /
translated: dwelling in the supreme Tuṣita realm,

original: mchod par bya bas mchod pa /
analyzed: mchod par bya bas mchod pa /
translated: is worshipped with offerings,

original: dbang bskur ba thob pa /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob pa /
translated: has attained consecration,

original: lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te brjod cing bsngags pa /
analyzed: lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te brjod cing bsngags pa /
translated: He was praised, honored, and extolled by hundreds of thousands of gods.

original: bsam pa thob pa /
analyzed: bsam pa thob pa /
translated: He had attained his aspirations.

original: smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa /
analyzed: smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa /
translated: He had been exalted by his prayers.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
translated: He possessed the mind that had attained all the qualities of a buddha.

original: ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa; sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang /
analyzed: ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa; sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang /
translated: He possessed the vast and pure eye of wisdom.🔽He possessed the great waves of the mind that blazed with mindfulness, intelligence, realization, conscience, and joy.

original: thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
translated: He had reached the perfection of the great skill in means of generosity, discipline, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.

original: tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the path of Brahmā, which is great love, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa /
translated: He had attained the unobstructed and unattached wisdom vision through his great supernormal knowledge and awareness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang; dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang; dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa /
translated: He had perfected the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the bases of supernatural powers, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, the path, and all the factors of awakening.

original: bsod @9b nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa /
analyzed: bsod @9b nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa /
translated: His body was well adorned with the major and minor marks of infinite merit and wisdom.

original: yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with long-term perseverance.

original: ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba /
translated: He was a speaker of truth, whose words were never false, and he did as he spoke.

original: drang zhing ma yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: drang zhing ma yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had an honest, upright, and guileless mind, free of any impediments.

original: nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
translated: He was free of pride, arrogance, conceit, fear, and timidity, and he had an attitude of equality toward all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
translated: He had served countless hundreds of thousands of quintillions of buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the face that many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of bodhisattvas looked up to.

original: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He was praised by Śakra, Brahmā, Maheśvara, the world protectors, gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, and kiṃnaras.

original: tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste ston pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste ston pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the knowledge that engages with the unimpeded discernment of all words and their explanation.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa gzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrul pa med pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas su med pa rab tu thob pa /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par @10a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa gzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrul pa med pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas su med pa rab tu thob pa / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par @10a *//
translated: He was a vessel of mindfulness, holding the teachings of all the buddhas without error, and he had attained infinite dhāraṇīs.

original: spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po /
analyzed: spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po /
translated: He was a great captain of the great ship of Dharma, which was well-provisioned with the jewels of the Dharma of the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the perfection of wisdom, and skillful means, and which was well-provisioned with the provisions of merit.

original: chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can /
translated: He had the intention to cross to the other side of the four rivers.

original: bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa /
analyzed: bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa /
translated: He had defeated Māra and his adversaries.

original: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa /
translated: He had completely defeated all opponents.

original: g-yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa /
analyzed: g-yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa /
translated: He was seated at the forefront of the battlefield.

original: nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa /
translated: He had defeated the hordes of the enemies of the afflictions.

original: ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa /
translated: It was firm with the weapon of the vajra of supreme wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa /
translated: It was born from the root of bodhicitta, the trunk of great compassion, and the sap of superior intention, and it was deep and stable, moistened by the water of the Dharma of diligence.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can /
translated: It had the essence of skillful means.🔽It had the petals of the branches of enlightenment and the stamen of concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ze'u 'bru dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ze'u 'bru dang ldan pa /
translated: It had the pistil cup of samādhi.

original: yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa /
translated: It was born from the lake of the vast accumulation of qualities.

original: nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa /
translated: The moon of the absence of the torment of pride and arrogance had a stainless and blooming petal.

original: tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i gsung gi ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i gsung gi ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba /
translated: The scent of discipline, learning, and conscientiousness rose up in the ten directions without impediment.

original: 'jig rten na shes pas thu bor gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten na shes pas thu bor gyur pa /
translated: It was the most knowledgeable in the world.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa /
translated: It was unstained by the eight worldly concerns.

original: skyes bu chen po'i padma /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i padma /
translated: It is a lotus of a great being.

original: @10b bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba /
analyzed: @10b bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba /
translated: It emits the sweet scent of the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i padma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa /
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i padma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa /
translated: The light of the sun of wisdom and gnosis opens the hundred petals of the lotus of the very pure eye.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa /
translated: It has the speed of the four bases of miraculous powers.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba /
translated: It has the very sharp claws and fangs of the four noble truths.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang bsnyer ba /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang bsnyer ba /
translated: It has the straight teeth of the four pure abodes.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa /
translated: It has the head of the very complete four means of gathering.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: It has the body of the noble one that gradually arises from understanding the twelve links of dependent origination.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing /
translated: It has the matted hair of the perfect completion of the thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: rig pa dang / ye shes kyi ze ba can /
analyzed: rig pa dang / ye shes kyi ze ba can /
translated: It has the stamen of knowledge and gnosis.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha gdangs ba /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha gdangs ba /
translated: His mouth is open to the three gates of liberation.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the eyes of very pure śamatha and vipaśyanā.

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa /
translated: He dwells in the caves of the mountains of dhyāna, liberation, samādhi, and samāpatti.

original: spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a body born in the forest of the four modes of conduct and the forest.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, and the proximate powers.

original: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang spu g-yo ba med pa /
analyzed: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang spu g-yo ba med pa /
translated: He is without the fear of birth and destruction and without the trembling of his hairs.

original: rtsal la zhum pa med pa /
analyzed: rtsal la zhum pa med pa /
translated: He is without the slackness of his prowess.

original: mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dvags mang po'i tshogs rab tu @11a *//
analyzed: mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dvags mang po'i tshogs rab tu @11a *//
translated: He is the one who completely destroys the many herds of the wild asses of the tīrthikas and the deer.

original: 'joms pa / bdag med par sgra brjod pa'i sengge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa /
analyzed: 'joms pa / bdag med par sgra brjod pa'i sengge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa /
translated: He is the one who roars the great lion’s roar of selflessness.

original: skyes bu sengge dang / rnam par grol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa /
analyzed: skyes bu sengge dang / rnam par grol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa /
translated: He was a lion among men, liberated, and his wisdom shone like the light and rays of the maṇḍala of concentration.

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog dang rab rib med par byed pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog dang rab rib med par byed pa /
translated: He removed the darkness of ignorance, the cataracts and the blindness.

original: stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba /
analyzed: stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba /
translated: He blazed with strength and diligence.

original: lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with the splendor of the splendor of merit among gods and humans.

original: skyes bu chen po nyi ma /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po nyi ma /
translated: He was a great man, the sun.

original: nag po'i phyogs med pa /
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs med pa /
translated: He was without the dark side.

original: dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: He was complete with the bright side.

original: blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa /
translated: He was beautiful and pleasing to the eye, and he was unimpeded to the faculty of sight.

original: lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: He was adorned with the hosts of hundreds of thousands of stars of gods.

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can /
translated: He had the maṇḍala of concentration, liberation, and wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa /
translated: He was the light rays of the moon of the happiness of the branches of enlightenment.

original: mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 'byed pa skyes bu chen po zla ba /
analyzed: mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 'byed pa skyes bu chen po zla ba /
translated: He was a great being, like the moon, the flower of men and gods, the opening kumuta flower.

original: 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba /
analyzed: 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba /
translated: He had gone to the four continents of his retinue.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa /
translated: He possessed the seven jewels of the branches of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba /
translated: He was engaged in the attitude of equality toward all sentient beings.

original: blo dpyad thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: blo dpyad thogs pa med pa /
translated: His mind was unimpeded.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pa'i khyad par du pogs dbyung @11b bar bya ba'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pa'i khyad par du pogs dbyung @11b bar bya ba'i bsam pa can /
translated: He had the perfect and complete austerity and discipline of the path of the ten virtues.

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba /
translated: He was the supreme precious Dharma wheel of the king of Dharma, which was turned without impediment.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba /
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba /
translated: He was born into the lineage of the universal monarch.

original: chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po /
translated: He was a great Dharma cakravartin.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba /
translated: He was filled with the profound and difficult-to-fathom dependent origination.

original: chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba /
analyzed: chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba /
translated: He was filled with all the precious jewels of the Dharma.

original: thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba /
analyzed: thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba /
translated: They were insatiable in their learning, and so their wisdom and discipline were vast, extensive, and limitless.

original: blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa /
analyzed: blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa /
translated: Their minds were as vast and supreme as the ocean and the earth.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam pa'i sems su gyur pa /
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam pa'i sems su gyur pa /
translated: Their minds were equal to the earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g-yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g-yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
translated: Their minds were as stable and unshakable as Mount Meru.

original: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa /
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa /
translated: They were free from attachment and anger.

original: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa /
translated: Their minds were as vast, extensive, and incomparable as the center of the sky.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa /
translated: They had extremely pure superior intention.

original: sbyin pa legs par byin pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa legs par byin pa /
translated: They had given generously.

original: sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa /
analyzed: sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa /
translated: They had previously engaged well.

original: lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa /
translated: They had performed superior activities well.

original: bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa /
analyzed: bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa /
translated: They were well adorned with the ornament of truth.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba /
translated: They had sought out all roots of virtue.

original: gos par bya ba bsgos pa /
analyzed: gos par bya ba bsgos pa /
translated: He had been anointed with the anointment of the Dharma.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa /
translated: He had planted the roots of virtue.

original: bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
translated: He had accumulated all roots of virtue for seven incalculable eons.

original: sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa /
translated: He had given the seven kinds of gifts.

original: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu @12a *//🔽bsten pa / legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum /🔽ngag gi rnam bzhi /
analyzed: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu @12a *// bsten pa / legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum / ngag gi rnam bzhi /
translated: He had relied on the five things that create merit.

original: yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa /
translated: He had practiced the three physical, four verbal, and three mental good actions.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pa dang ldan pa /🔽yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bsten par gyur pa /🔽yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btab pa /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pa dang ldan pa / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bsten par gyur pa / yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btab pa /
translated: He had relied on the path of the ten virtues.🔽He had relied on the correct practice with its forty branches.🔽He had made the correct aspiration with its forty branches.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered into the superior intention with its forty branches.

original: yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa; yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa; yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa /
translated: He had perfected the forty branches of true liberation and straightened the forty branches of true devotion.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba /
translated: He had gone forth under four hundred and forty billion buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa /
translated: He had made offerings to five hundred and fifty billion buddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
translated: He had served four hundred and fifty million pratyekabuddhas.

original: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
analyzed: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
translated: He had established countless, innumerable sentient beings on the paths to the higher realms and liberation.

original: tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: He was one birth away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba /
translated: After passing away from here, he will be reborn in the excellent realm of Tushita, where he will be known as the excellent son of the gods, Sijita.

original: lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni @12b 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa /
analyzed: lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni @12b 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa /
translated: The hosts of gods will make offerings to him, saying, “After passing away from here, he will be reborn in the human world and will soon fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.”

original: gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong rab tu gnas pa /🔽stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa /
analyzed: gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong rab tu gnas pa / stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa /
translated: He will dwell in a celestial palace that is thirty-two thousand leagues in size.🔽It will be adorned with terraces, balconies, archways, windows, pavilions, multistoried buildings, and courtyards.

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba /
analyzed: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba /
translated: It will be raised on poles and draped with parasols, victory banners, and flags.

original: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa /
translated: It will be covered with a canopy of nets of precious bells.

original: me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po chal par bkram pa /
analyzed: me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po chal par bkram pa /
translated: It will be strewn with mandara and great mandara flowers.

original: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa /
analyzed: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa /
translated: There were quintillions of divine maidens singing songs.

original: me tog aa ti mukta dang / tsampa ka dang / skya snar dang / sa brtol dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / n+ya gro dha dang / tindu ka dang / aa sa na dang / dong ka'i me tog dang /
analyzed: me tog aa ti mukta dang / tsampa ka dang / skya snar dang / sa brtol dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / n+ya gro dha dang / tindu ka dang / aa sa na dang / dong ka'i me tog dang /
translated: There were flowers of atimuktaka, campaka, kīsa, sāla, bhadra, mahābhadragandhā, aśoka, nyagrodha, tinduka, āsana, and blue lotuses.

original: shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / s'a la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa /
analyzed: shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / s'a la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa /
translated: There were trees of keśara, tamāla, and sāla, and it was adorned with great jeweled trees.

original: gser gyi dra bas g-yogs pa /
analyzed: gser gyi dra bas g-yogs pa /
translated: It was covered with a golden net.

original: gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa /
analyzed: gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa /
translated: It was even and beautiful with its array.

original: me tog smad 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / barshi ka dang / ta ra ni dang / ba li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / mchog tu dri zhim dang / da nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang /
analyzed: me tog smad 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / barshi ka dang / ta ra ni dang / ba li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / mchog tu dri zhim dang / da nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang /
translated: There were flowers of māndārava, mallikā, jasmine, vārṣika, tāraṇi, bali, koṭaranī, supreme fragrance, danuṣkāri, divine jasmine,

original: autpal dang / padma dang / ku mu da @13a *//
analyzed: autpal dang / padma dang / ku mu da @13a *//
translated: utpala, padma, kumuda,

original: dang / padma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla bre chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa /
analyzed: dang / padma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla bre chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa /
translated: and white lotuses, and great canopies of fragrant incense were spread out in all directions.

original: bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur ba dang / ku na la dang / ka la pingka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa /
analyzed: bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur ba dang / ku na la dang / ka la pingka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa /
translated: There were various birds such as peacocks, parrots, myna birds, cuckoos, geese, peacocks, avadavats, kunalas, kalaviṅkas, and pheasants that sang sweetly.

original: lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltad mor bya ba /
analyzed: lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltad mor bya ba /
translated: Many quintillions of gods were looking on and watching.

original: chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa /
analyzed: chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa /
translated: The great Dharma was being taught, and all the afflictions of the force of delight in desire were being cut through.

original: nga rgyal dang; rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba med par gyur pa /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang; rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba med par gyur pa /
translated: There was no pride, arrogance, haughtiness, anger, harshness, or malice.

original: dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa rgya che zhing gsal ba /
analyzed: dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa rgya che zhing gsal ba /
translated: There was joy, delight, and supreme joy, and the memory was vast and clear.

original: skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
analyzed: skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
translated: In that great palace of birth, he was dwelling in comfort, and a discussion of the true Dharma arose, and from the sounds of the eighty-four thousand musical instruments and songs, these verses of exhortation arose, due to the Bodhisattva's past virtuous karma:🔽You possess the vast accumulation of merit, mindfulness, understanding,

original: bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa //
analyzed: bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa //
translated: infinite intelligence, and the light of wisdom.

original: mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba //
analyzed: mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba //
translated: You possess incomparable strength and vast skill.

original: mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod //
analyzed: mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod //
translated: Remember the prophecy of Dīpaṃkara!

original: rgya chen @13b dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
analyzed: rgya chen @13b dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
translated: You possess the vast, stainless mind,

original: dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba //
analyzed: dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba //
translated: free from the three stains, with pacified arrogance and faults.

original: dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs //
analyzed: dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs //
translated: Your mind is pure, stainless, and virtuous.

original: sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod //
analyzed: sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod //
translated: Remember how you practiced generosity in the past!

original: zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang // dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs //
analyzed: zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang // dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs //
translated: And have cultivated concentration and wisdom for many eons.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams spyad pa //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams spyad pa //
translated: You have practiced for many quintillions of eons.

original: spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod //
analyzed: spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod //
translated: You have developed great conduct. Please consider this!

original: sems can rnams la thugs brtse mdzad gyur cing //
analyzed: sems can rnams la thugs brtse mdzad gyur cing //
translated: You have had compassion for sentient beings

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyed kyis mchod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyed kyis mchod //
translated: And have made offerings to many quintillions of buddhas.

original: dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas //
analyzed: dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas //
translated: Please consider this, O you of infinite renown!

original: de dus lags kyi btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /
analyzed: de dus lags kyi btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /
translated: Please do not be indifferent at this time!

original: rga shi nyon mongs 'jigs mdzad rdul bral ba //
analyzed: rga shi nyon mongs 'jigs mdzad rdul bral ba //
translated: “You are free of dust, you have overcome the fear of aging and death.

original: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyi //
analyzed: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyi //
translated: The lords of the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, and asuras are waiting.

original: 'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod //
translated: Please teach the way of passing beyond suffering, knowing the way of passing beyond suffering.

original: bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang //
translated: “You have practiced austerities for a thousand eons,
